service_selector.description: Defines a series match conditions of services

services.description: The service names to discover. If not specified, match to all the service names.

tags.description: The tags to match for the services. All tags must match

labels.description: The labels to match for the services. All labels must match

service_types.description: Include services of any of the service types.

runtimes.description: Include services of any of the runtimes.

clusters.description: Include services of any of the clusters.

exclude_labels.description: The labels to exclude for the services. Be excluded if include any these labels.

exclude_joined_labels.description: A list of joined labels to exclude for the services.

items.description: The labels to exclude for the services. All the labels must match to be excluded.

database_connect.description: Database parameters for connect to an existing database.

port.description: Database server port. default: mysql=3306, postgres=5432

username.description: Database administrator login name. default: cloudtik

types.description: The list of runtimes to enable for this cluster

scaling_policy.description: The built-in scaling policy name to use. Values: scaling-with-load, scaling-with-time

scaling_step.description: The number of nodes for each scale up step.

scaling_resource.description: The resource type to check for scale: CPU or memory

cpu_load_threshold.description: The cpu load threshold to start scale

memory_load_threshold.description: The memory load threshold to start scale

in_use_cpu_load_threshold.description: The minimum cpu load to consider the machine is in use

scaling_periodic.description: The periodic to use for scaling with time policy. Values: daily, weekly, monthly

scaling_math_base.description: The base number to use for arithmetic such as *2. Values: on-min-workers, on-previous-time

scaling_policy_class.description: The module and class path of the scaling policy class

metastore_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use metastore service in the same workspace.

metastore_service_selector.description: The selector for Metastore service if service discovery is enabled.

hive_metastore_uri.description: Metastore service endpoint for Spark to use.

with_gpu.description: Whether to use GPU frameworks and libraries for AI

with_oneapi.description: Whether to use oneAPI frameworks and libraries for AI

database.description: The database parameters. Engine, address, port are optional if using service discovery.

database_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use database service in the same workspace.

database_service_selector.description: The selector for database service if service discovery is enabled.

hadoop_default_cluster.description: Whether to set Hadoop default to cluster storage if available.

hdfs_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use HDFS service in the same workspace.

hdfs_service_selector.description: The selector for HDFS service if service discovery is enabled.

hdfs_namenode_uri.description: HDFS service endpoint specified explicitly to access in the format of hdfs://host:port.

minio_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use MinIO service in the same workspace.

minio_service_selector.description: The selector for MinIO service if service discovery is enabled.

minio_endpoint_uri.description: MinIO service endpoint specified explicitly to access in the format of http://host:port.

hdfs_mount_method.description: HDFS mount method: nfs or fuse. Default fuse if not specified.

scaling_mode.description: The YARN scaling mode. Values: apps-pending, aggressive

scaling_step.description: The number of nodes for each scale up step.

scaling_resource.description: The resource type to check for scale: CPU or memory

apps_pending_threshold.description: The number of pending apps threshold to trigger scaling.

apps_pending_free_cores_threshold.description: The number of free cores threshold below which to trigger scaling.

apps_pending_free_memory_threshold.description: The size of free memory threshold in MB below which to trigger scaling.

aggressive_free_ratio_threshold.description: The free cpu or memory ratio below which to trigger scaling for aggressive mode.

yarn_resource_memory_ratio.description: The yarn node virtual memory ratio vs the available physical memory.

yarn_scheduler.description: The yarn scheduler to use: capacity or fair

auto_scaling.description: Whether to enable ray based auto scaling

metastore_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use metastore service in the same workspace.

metastore_service_selector.description: The selector for Metastore service if service discovery is enabled.

hive_metastore_uri.description: Metastore service endpoint for Flink to use.

database.description: The database parameters. Engine, address, port are optional if using service discovery.

database_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use database service in the same workspace.

database_service_selector.description: The selector for database service if service discovery is enabled.

high_availability.description: Whether to run a server on each node for high availability.

force_clean.description: Whether to force clean the data directory when starting.

zookeeper_connect.description: Zookeeper servers to use for Kafka.

zookeeper_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use zookeeper service in the same workspace.

zookeeper_service_selector.description: The selector for Zookeeper service if service discovery is enabled.

metastore_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use metastore service in the same workspace.

metastore_service_selector.description: The selector for Metastore service if service discovery is enabled.

hive_metastore_uri.description: Explicit Metastore service endpoint for Presto to use.

metastore_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use metastore service in the same workspace.

metastore_service_selector.description: The selector for Metastore service if service discovery is enabled.

hive_metastore_uri.description: Explicit Metastore service endpoint for Trino to use.

server.description: Whether the cluster with Consul runs with Consul server or client agent.

data_center.description: Override Consul data center name. By default is the workspace name.

disable_cluster_node_name.description: Whether to disable setting node name to cluster name combining seq id.

high_availability.description: Whether to run a server on each node for high availability. Each server will scrape the same set of targets

scrape_scope.description: The scrape scope for this server: local, workspace or federation.

scrape_services.description: The selector for services to scrape.

federation_targets.description: The Prometheus targets for federation to use if no service discovery deployed

labels.description: The optional labels to add for the targets

high_availability.description: Whether to run a server on each node for high availability.

data_sources_scope.description: The data sources scope from which to configure this server: local or workspace.

data_sources.description: Array of static data sources to be configured.

data_sources_services.description: The selector for workspace services as data sources.

protocol.description: The frontend protocol: tcp or http.

app_mode.description: The application mode: load-balancer or api-gateway.

high_availability.description: Whether to run a server on each node for high availability.

config_mode.description: How the backend is configured: dns, static, dynamic

balance.description: The backend balance algorithm and arguments: roundrobin, leastconn, first, random, hash and so.

max_servers.description: The max number of servers. This is needed only for HAProxy server template.

selector.description: The selector for services for the backend.

service_name.description: The service name used for DNS discovery.

service_tag.description: The service tag used for DNS discovery.

service_cluster.description: The cluster of the service. Service tag and service cluster are exclusive.

servers.description: Array of static servers for the backend.

session_persistence.description: The session persistence method: none, cookie or ip

app_mode.description: The application mode: web, load-balancer or api-gateway.

high_availability.description: Whether to run a server on each node for high availability.

config_mode.description: How the backend is configured: dns, static, dynamic

balance.description: The backend balance algorithm and arguments: round_robin, least_conn, random, ip_hash or hash.

selector.description: The selector for services for the backend.

service_name.description: The service name used for DNS discovery.

service_port.description: The service port of the backend.

service_tag.description: The service tag used for DNS discovery.

service_cluster.description: The cluster of the service. Service tag and service cluster are exclusive.

servers.description: Array of static servers for the backend.

cluster_mode.description: The replication method to use: none, replication, group_replication.

root_password.description: Specify the root user password when initializing the MySQL instance.

name.description: The name of the database to create at the initializing process.

user.description: The user to create and grant access for the database at the initializing process

password.description: The password for the user set at the initializing process.

group_replication_name.description: Specify your own group replication name (GUID). Generate from workspace and cluster name hash by default.

group_replication_port.description: Specify the group replication port to be used.

multi_primary.description: Whether the group replication is a multi-primary group. Default is single-primary.

cluster_mode.description: The replication method to use: none, replication.

admin_user.description: Specify the admin username when initializing the MySQL instance.

admin_password.description: Specify the admin password when initializing the MySQL instance.

replication_password.description: Specify the replication password for replication cluster.

archive_mode.description: Whether to enable archive mode and archive based recovery when WAL purged.

replication_slot.description: Whether to enable replication slot for WAL bookkeeping.

mode.description: Whether enable synchronous standby: none, default, first and any.

num.description: The number of synchronous for first or any mode.

name.description: Database to create at the initializing process.

user.description: The user to create and grant access for the database at the initializing process

password.description: The password for the user set at the initializing process.

default_resolver.description: Whether to set this DNS server as the system default resolver in /etc/resolv.conf.
Whether to set this DNS server as the system default resolver in /etc/resolv.conf.

dnssec_validation.description: The DNSSEC validation setting: yes, auto, no.

default_resolver.description: Whether to set this DNS server as the system default resolver in /etc/resolv.conf.

admin_key.description: APISIX admin key. If not specified, there is a default.

etcd_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use ETCD service in the same workspace.

etcd_service_selector.description: The selector for Metastore service if service discovery is enabled.

etcd_uri.description: Explicit set ETCD service to use.

config_mode.description: How the backend is configured: dns, ring-dns, dynamic

selector.description: The selector for backend services if service discovery is enabled.

balance.description: The balance method used for backend servers: roundrobin, chash, least_conn, ewma

database.description: The database parameters. Engine, address, port are optional if using service discovery.

database_service_discovery.description: Whether to discover and use database service in the same workspace.

database_service_selector.description: The selector for database service if service discovery is enabled.

config_mode.description: How the backend is configured: dns, ring-dns, dynamic

selector.description: The selector for backend services if service discovery is enabled.

balance.description: The balance method used for backend servers: round-robin, consistent-hashing, least-connections, latency

server_pool_size.description: The number of nodes for a single server pool. The cluster size (including head) must be multiple times of the server pool size.

service_on_head.description: Whether to run MinIO service on head node.

cluster_mode.description: The replication method to use: none, simple, replication, sharding.

password.description: Specify the password for Redis instance.

cluster_port.description: Specify the internal cluster communication port to be used for a shared cluster.

master_size.description: The number of masters. The remaining workers will be replicas. Default to half of the static nodes at starting cluster.

reshard_delay.description: The number of seconds to delay for a new master nodes to do resharding after meet the cluster.

cluster_mode.description: The replication method to use: none, replication, sharding.

name.description: The name of the database to create at the initializing process.

user.description: The user to create and grant access for the database at the initializing process

password.description: The password for the user set at the initializing process.

replication_set_name.description: The replication set name. Default to workspace_name-cluster_name.

replication_set_key.description: The replication set key to use. Length should be greater than 5 characters and should not contain any special characters.

cluster_role.description: Sharding cluster role: configsvr, mongos, or shardsvr.

mongos_port.description: The mongos port. Default to 27017 for standalone mongos and 27018 for mongos running on config server or shard server.
